rawResults.name: MicrobatchCollector + Kafka (Batch Send)
rawResults.notes: Submitted: 131,402,895 events; Sent to Kafka: 110,600,000 events; Batches sent: 1,016; Avg batch size: 108858.3; Avg Kafka batch time: 5.209 ms; Kafka throughput: 11,055,578 events/sec; Best config: batch=30000000, interval=30000000Âµs
